A

ABSTRACT - Enum constant in enum class model.EnemyType
 
addEnemyToALevel(Enemy, int) - Method in class model.VideoGame
addEnemyToALevel: This method allows to add an enemy to a level if space is available.
addNameOfTreasure(String) - Method in class model.VideoGame
addNameOfTreasure: This method allows you to add non-repeated treasure names to an array.
addPlayer(Player) - Method in class model.VideoGame
addPlayer: This method allows to add players to the array of players within the video game, if the player does not yet exist or if there is still space available.
addTreasureToALevel(Treasure, int, int) - Method in class model.VideoGame
addTreasureToALevel: This method allows to add a treasure to a level if space is available.

BOSS - Enum constant in enum class model.EnemyType
 

C

calculateLevelDifficulty() - Method in class model.Level
calculateLevelDifficulty: This method allows to calculate the difficulty of the level based on the score increased by treasures and the score decreased by enemies.
calculateNumberOfConsonantsInEnemyNames() - Method in class model.VideoGame
calculateNumberOfConsonantsInEnemyNames: This method counts and returns the consonants of the names of all enemies in the video game.
chooseResolution() - Method in class ui.Main
chooseResolution: This method displays and allows to choose the resolution that the video game will have.
confirmTypeOfEnemy(String) - Method in class model.VideoGame
confirmTypeOfEnemy: This method checks if the type of enemy entered matches any of those allowed by the video game.
